page.title: 09Eating habits
page.content: School meals,eating out,and domestic purchases reflect changing tastes.{ {Chinese & Indian}food are popular 'take-away' meals and{American}'junk' food such as hamburgers and pizzas are increasingly popular convenience foods A revival of interest in traditional 'healthy' foods has seen increased eating of{wholemeal bread}and{organic {grown vegetables.}Even{cask beers}are replacing fizzy pressurized beers. Tradition still means a{roast}meal for Sunday lunch.Since a joint of{roast {beef}for 4 will cost Â£4+{poultry}has become more popular. Continental influences include more{garlic,wine {and pasta}used in cooking. Weight consciousness has seen reduced consumption of{potatoes.}Dairy products such as{milk,cheese and {yoghurt}are popular snacks.{Tea & {Coffee}and{Coca-Cola}are popular too
